name: Suchitra Hapse
bio: Sr. Software Engineer with extensive experience for over 7 years. My experties is to test a software, graphic design and many more...
detailedBio: I am a Certified Scrum Master (CSM) and ISTQB Certified Senior Software Tester/QA with 6.9 years of experience at Accenture in the Finance domain, specializing in Banking and Insurance applications. I bring deep expertise across all phases of the Software Testing Life Cycle (STLC) and Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC)â€”from requirement analysis, Test Planning and Strategy, Test Execution, Defect Management, Reporting and Post-Release Validation & Support.
